cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is an amazingly beat down automobile that may or may not run for you, it is equiped with 'somewhat' powered windows, a working radio, and luxurious stained front passenger seat.
Please buy this vehicle, it is equiped with manually powered windows, a very loose belt, and a motor that will probably backfire but somehow still runs.
